Query GDC for projects

Query GDC for projects

project_fields(primary = TRUE)

projects(..., token = NULL, fields = project_fields())

Arguments

primary
logical(1) when TRUE (default) return commonly populated field names. Otherwise, return all field names defined in the API.
token
(optional) character(1) security token allowing access to restricted data. See https://docs.gdc.cancer.gov/API/Users_Guide/Getting_Started/#authentication.
fields
character() vector of requested fields. See project_fields() for defined fields.
…
(optional) additional parameters influencing project selection. See parameters.

Examples

projects()                        # first 10 projects, as a data.frame
#> GET request uri:
#> https://gdc-api.nci.nih.gov/projects?format=XML&pretty=FALSE&fields=dbgap_accession_number,disease_type,released,state,primary_site,project_id,name&size=10&from=1
#> No encoding supplied: defaulting to UTF-8.
#>    dbgap_accession_number
#> 1                        
#> 2                        
#> 3               phs000467
#> 4                        
#> 5                        
#> 6                        
#> 7                        
#> 8                        
#> 9                        
#> 10              phs000468
#>                                                        disease_type released
#> 1                                                           Sarcoma     true
#> 2                                         Pancreatic Adenocarcinoma     true
#> 3                                                     Neuroblastoma     true
#> 4                                             Rectum Adenocarcinoma     true
#> 5                                                      Mesothelioma     true
#> 6                                           Glioblastoma Multiforme     true
#> 7                             Kidney Renal Papillary Cell Carcinoma     true
#> 8                                          Adrenocortical Carcinoma     true
#> 9  Cervical Squamous Cell Carcinoma and Endocervical Adenocarcinoma     true
#> 10                                                     Osteosarcoma     true
#>     state   primary_site project_id
#> 1  legacy    Soft Tissue  TCGA-SARC
#> 2  legacy       Pancreas  TCGA-PAAD
#> 3  legacy Nervous System TARGET-NBL
#> 4  legacy     Colorectal  TCGA-READ
#> 5  legacy         Pleura  TCGA-MESO
#> 6  legacy          Brain   TCGA-GBM
#> 7  legacy         Kidney  TCGA-KIRP
#> 8  legacy  Adrenal Gland   TCGA-ACC
#> 9  legacy         Cervix  TCGA-CESC
#> 10 legacy           Bone  TARGET-OS
#>                                                                name
#> 1                                                           Sarcoma
#> 2                                         Pancreatic Adenocarcinoma
#> 3                                                     Neuroblastoma
#> 4                                             Rectum Adenocarcinoma
#> 5                                                      Mesothelioma
#> 6                                           Glioblastoma Multiforme
#> 7                             Kidney Renal Papillary Cell Carcinoma
#> 8                                          Adrenocortical Carcinoma
#> 9  Cervical Squamous Cell Carcinoma and Endocervical Adenocarcinoma
#> 10                                                     Osteosarcoma
df <- projects(from=10, size=20)  # projects 10, 11, ... 29
#> GET request uri:
#> https://gdc-api.nci.nih.gov/projects?format=XML&pretty=FALSE&fields=dbgap_accession_number,disease_type,released,state,primary_site,project_id,name&size=20&from=10
#> No encoding supplied: defaulting to UTF-8.
dim(df)
#> [1] 20  7
